modName: Alfheim Knights - Ayleid Soldiers (An Elven Set Retex)
summary: Ayleid themed armor and weapons for the elven army.
descriptionHtml:
Hello, folks! This is my first mod, so, don't be bad with me lol.

This is just a retexture. With jgreybear's permission, I used his amazing textures on this mod, now the elven armor looks like and ayleid set, just that, it looks better with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37487/]aMidianBorn Ebony Armor[/url]'s cubemap (the silver version).

I have added an optional patch for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70200/]Ayleid Citadel[/url]﻿ that changes the citadel guards and house carl outfit's, giving them the elven set insteat glass set, now they looks like ayleid soldiers, that will follow you in your crusade on Skyrim.

Some screenshot. She is Morrigan, my breton waifu c:

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/31964150-1514081166.png[/img]﻿

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/31964150-1514081446.png[/img]﻿

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/31964150-1514081652.png[/img]﻿

Credits:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/136773?tab=user+files]jgreybear[/url]﻿ thanks for your amazing textures
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4138425?tab=user+files]skyrimlazz[/url]﻿ thanks for your amazing Ayleid mods
Bethesda, for create this wonderful game!

Recomended mods:
[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/gomapero/]GomaPero Poses[/url]﻿ (just for fun with the screenshots)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8489/]Katana Crafting[/url]﻿ (this one adds elven samurai weapons, they look amazing with this textures)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25431]Quarterstaffs[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33504]Alfheim Knights[/url]﻿ (standalone and original mod)
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70200]Ayleid Citadel[/url] (if you want to use the patch)
author: KingstonPrince7
